page.title: 05POPULATION
page.content: WITHIN THIS THINLY POPULATED AREA LIVE 37 ADULTS AND 19 CHILDREN. THERE IS NO INDUSTRY AS SUCH TO ATTRACT MORE INHABITANTS. THE SIX FARMS ARE MOSTLY SELF-SUFFICIENT IN LABOUR. THE POPULATION IS MAINLY ACTIVE RETIRED PEOPLE ENJOYING PLEASANT SURROUNDINGS, OR COMING BACK TO THEIR ROOTS, OR SOMETIMES CONTINUING LIFE IN AN AREA WHERE THEY ONCE WORKED. OF THE YOUNGER POPULATION SOME ARE SELF-EMPLOYED IN SKILLS AS VARIED AS CAR MAINTENANCE AND JEWELLERY MAKING. OTHERS SELL LOCAL PRODUCE SUCH AS HONEY. SOME REMAIN UNEMPLOYED. ONE OR TWO PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE TRAVEL AFAR TO THEIR PRACTICES. CHILDREN ATTEND THE PRIMARY SCHOOL IN THE VILLAGE. OLDER CHILDREN TO PRESTEIGNE. TOURISTS OCCUPY HOLIDAY COTTAGES ALSO BOARD AT FARMS AND HOUSES IN VICINITY.
